summary:
A starter cabin in Riverwood, across the river from the sawmill. It only costs 500 gold (250 extra for the basement add-on).
Fully nav-meshed for followers.
descriptionHtml:
Game: Skyrim
Mod Name: Cabin
Version: 1.1
Contact Info:
Source:
Author(s): Nart2007

Description:

A starter cabin in Riverwood, across the river from the sawmill. It only costs 500 gold (250 extra for the basement add-on).
Fully nav-meshed for followers.

Features:

4 weapon plaques (2 inside and 2 outside)
Plenty of storage (safe and non-respawning)
Interactive lighting, fireplace and curtains.
Removable boards for the guild HQ marker from the great mod, Guild Starter by Sokco816.
Idle and furniture markers inside and out for followers.

Cleaned with TES5Edit.

Requirements: No DLC's required.

Skyrim (latest update v1.9.29.0)

Installation:

Use NMM or drop the Cabin.bsa, and Cabin.esp in your SteamsteamappscommonSkyrimData folder.

Uninstallation:

Use NMM or delete the Cabin.bsa, and Cabin.esp in your SteamsteamappscommonSkyrimData folder.

Known Issues:

Faqs:

Credits and Thanks To:

Berts Bits And Bobs: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36756/?

Berts CK Tutorials: http://bertscktutorial.ucoz.com/index/niffed_triggers/0-10

New in Version 1.1:

1) Fixed fish spawner
2) Replaced log siding normal mapping with a more volumetric (shadows) version.

Tools Used:

Skyrim Creation Kit, NifSkope, Photoshop CS6, TES5Edit, LOOT, BSAopt x64, WryeBash

Before installing ANY new version, I strongly recommend moving out all your personal belongings and items in containers and storing them somewhere safe OR keep them in your inventory and just use the tilde key (`) to open up the console and type "TGM" without the quotes. This way you can carry any amount without being overcumbered. Then save somewhere like the Riverwood Trader. Then uninstall the mod and load up your save game and make a "clean" save. Now exit the game and install the new version of the mod and proceed as usual. If you don't want to buy the house back, just open the console again and type "player.additem 0000000f 750" without the quotes and it will give you the gold needed to purchase the home again.
author: Nart2007
